title: laptop
content: Can someone please recommend good HP or dell laptops? And what are the specifications I need to keep in mind while buying one (cpu type and core count, graphics processor series and which type, ram size, ssd size and anything else)?

Some Lenovo think books and ideapads are pretty ass , your friends maybe have those. Thinkpad and legion series have the biggest cult following for having good build quality and worth of money. Especially thinkpads will easily last 6+ years if you take care of it.

I would suggest you get a lenovo or a asus laptop instead of HP or Dell

Specifications wise I would suggest you get an intel i5/i7 **12th gen** processor(don't get 11th gen), 8GB RAM and 512GB SSD should be more than enough. Look for IPS displays  and see that the laptop has enough number of ports(atleast 2 USB A ports, 1 USB C port and 1 headphone jack
try to get a 16 gig or an 8 gig upgradeable at least. 8 core CPU works, i7 without a GPU and i5 with a GPU in this budget I think. depends what you plan to do with it
Victus if your are on budget and want gaming, Omen otherwise for HP
